column5: I know what you mean. I decided recently to make a big life change, and told a bunch of my friends both at work and away from work. Then I came to the realization that it will never happen, because I'm going to kill myself instead. Personally I believe in reincarnation, so hopefully the next life will be better.
Hollow books! Probably someone said this already, but I'm too lazy to scroll through the comments.
